duties_responsibilities.duty: Increase territory sales by engaging in product promotion and developing effective strategies to manage business.
Build rapport with customers in live and virtual environments, utilizing digital tools for successful engagement.
Utilize internal reports and analytics to identify strategic business opportunities and leverage product knowledge to educate providers.
Collaborate across the organization to address customer inquiries and advance business objectives.
Complete all administrative expectations on time and compliantly.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in relevant field (Master's preferred)
